product_metadata.plan_type: Unit-linked, Non-Participating, Individual Life Savings Insurance Plan
product_metadata.risk_disclaimer: Investment risk in the investment portfolio is borne by the policyholder.
product_metadata.lock_in_rule: No surrender or withdrawal is allowed during the first 5 policy years.

product_summary.objective: Bajaj Life GAIN is a ULIP savings plan designed to provide protection plus market-linked wealth growth with flexible investment funds, withdrawals, switching, and rider options.
key_highlights: Two variants available: Growth and Secure
Wide range of equity, debt and index funds
Systematic Partial Withdrawals after 5 years for monthly income
Unlimited free fund switches (Investor Selectable Strategy)
Top-up premium option to enhance savings
Family Benefit at maturity for existing Bajaj Life customers
Settlement option for maturity and death benefit payouts

plan_variants.death_benefit_type: Higher of Sum Assured OR Fund Value OR 105% Premiums Paid
Higher of (Sum Assured + Fund Value) OR 105% Premiums Paid

core_benefits.details: On survival till maturity, total Fund Value is payable provided policy is in force.
core_benefits.payout_type: Lump sum OR Installments via Settlement Option (max 5 years)

core_benefits.details: Higher of (Prevailing Sum Assured including Top-up SA) OR Fund Value OR Guaranteed Death Benefit (105% premiums paid).
Higher of (Prevailing Sum Assured + Fund Value) OR Guaranteed Death Benefit (105% premiums paid).

partial_withdrawal.regular_pay_limit: Up to 50% of Regular Fund Value
partial_withdrawal.single_pay_limit: Up to 25% of Single Fund Value

charges_structure.fund_management_charge: Up to 1.35% p.a. depending on fund
charges_structure.mortality_charge: Deducted monthly, guaranteed throughout policy term
charges_structure.female_advantage: Female lives get age-setback of 3 years

riders.rider_name: Linked New Critical Illness Benefit Rider

compliance_guardrails.ulip_risk_warning: ULIPs are subject to capital market risks. NAV may go up or down.
compliance_guardrails.lock_in_period: 5 years mandatory lock-in as per IRDAI regulations.
compliance_guardrails.free_look_period: 30 days from receipt of policy document.
compliance_guardrails.suicide_exclusion: If death due to suicide within 12 months, nominee receives Fund Value as on death intimation date.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to prevailing Income Tax laws.
compliance_guardrails.fraud_warning: IRDAI does not sell policies or announce bonuses.

retrieval_chunks.text: Bajaj Life GAIN offers two variants: Growth (whole life maturity option) and Secure (enhanced death benefit with Sum Assured + Fund Value).
Partial and systematic withdrawals are allowed only after completion of 5 policy years, enabling monthly income payouts.
Premium allocation charge is 2% in years 1–5, policy admin charge capped at ₹500/month, FMC up to 1.35% depending on fund.
Family benefit adds 0.5% or 1% at maturity if the policyholder has an existing Bajaj Life family customer relationship.
Maturity or death benefit can be received in installments over 5 years with each payout increased by 0.5% return enhancer.
